body_html:
hope this help someone pulling out from the mud:

$> ldd ./1_Utilities/deviceQueryDrv/deviceQueryDrv

linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffdedbe3000)

libcuda.so.1 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1 (0x00007fd94f3d9000)

librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007fd94f1d1000)

libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fd94efb3000)

libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007fd94edaf000)

libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007fd94e9e8000)

libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007fd94e6dd000)

/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000563cdb7fb000)

libnvidia-fatbinaryloader.so.375.66 => not found

as you can see the last line says "not found".
By simply

$> find /usr -name libnvidia-fatbinaryloader.so.375.66

/usr/lib/nvidia-375/libnvidia-fatbinaryloader.so.375.66

and

LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib/nvidia-375:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

I solved the issue.
